X matrices for Ghana

Source: R/data.R
XGH.Rd

A dataset containing X matrices for Ghana over a variety of years.

Usage

XGH

Format

A data frame with 43 rows and 3 variables:

Country

The country, Ghana

Year

The year for this row of the data frame

X

The X matrix for the year of this row of the data frame

Source

doi:10.1016/j.apenergy.2019.01.255

Details

These data were used to create Figure 7 and Table 6 in the paper

M.K. Heun and P.E. Brockway. Meeting 2030 primary energy and economic growth goals: Mission impossible? Applied Energy, 251(112697):1–24, May 2019.

On this page

Developed by Matthew Heun.
